Crafting Ingenuity
With commitment and a deep appreciation for the human element, we aim to craft superior experiences through ingenuity.
view our projects








Uplifting communities

Through various charities, land development, and property management, our aim is to leave the world in better condition than how we found it.






Following passions

Just like you, we have real passions. One of our passions happens to be beer. Sandhills Brewing attracts those who love our barrel aged wild ales.












Founded in 2009 by Pippin Williamson.
Headquartered in Hutchinson, Kansas.
More about Sandhills →










									Our projects 
Whether it's a software designed to enhance your business, or a Berliner-style Weisse perfect for sunny days outside, we create with passion and intent.











 

Conservation Project
The 43rd Prairie
54 acres of former cropland that is being restored to native tallgrass prairie.










 

Conservation Project
Stonebridge Park
A 3-acre greenspace located in a neighborhood.










 

Microbrewery

Central Kansas brewery focusing on barrel aged wild ales.

About Sandhills
Freedom is important to us. We work from the comfort of our own homes, or wherever we find ourselves happy and productive. We do our best work when we prioritize healthy workplaces. Our globally-distributed team consists of 26 professionals located in 5 countries across the globe.

Learn More










The latest from Sandhills blog
Awesome Motive has acquired our WordPress products and services
Today is a big day for Sandhills. I am very excited to announce that our entire suite of WordPress products and services, and the team have joined the Awesome Motive family!
